title: Clayton's Season of the Bachelor & The Art of Gaslighting
itunes:title: Clayton's Season of the Bachelor & The Art of Gaslighting
itunes:subtitle: The Bachelor has honestly become the ULTIMATE Psych 101 class
description:
This week, The Basic & The Brain revisits one of our favorite reality TV past times: The Bachelor Franchise. This time around we are focusing on Clayton's season of the Bachelor, in particular honing in on the Women Tell All episode as well as the Overnights (where Clayton woos his last 3 women and loses his shit on Susie Evans).


Come join us this week as we dive into Clayton's behavior, his gaslighting antics, the psychology of gaslighting, and why their attachment types effected how their conflict played out.


Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
